mapper.select: select u_id from u_tbl where u_id = #{u_id}
mapper.insert: insert into u_tbl (u_id, u_name, u_pw, u_email, u_zipcode, u_addr, u_addr_dtl, u_phone, u_nic, check_email_rx) values (#{u_id}, #{u_name}, #{u_pw}, #{u_email}, #{u_zipcode}, #{u_addr}, #{u_addr_dtl}, #{u_phone}, #{u_nic}, #{check_email_rx})
